title: Hartree's Ed Morse Reacts to Trump Venezuela Oil Exec Meeting
description: Ed Morse, Hartree Partners senior advisor, says Venezuela’s political uncertainty is a major risk for oil markets. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that its vast oil reserves are also among the world’s most costly to produce. (Source: Bloomberg)
